hero.github: Our github with the MIT code
hero.subtitle: The complete solution for your email flow, combining a modern framework for template creation with the most efficient and cost-effective cloud for email delivery.

Whats.title: What's JSX Mail?
Whats.description: JSX Mail is not just a framework, a library, or a cloud service. It is a complete email workflow tool that allows you to build emails, send emails, host your images, and much more.

cloud.title: Cloud
cloud.description: Send email, host images, get analytics from your email campaigns...

framework.title: Framework
framework.description: A modern framework for creating email templates

fully-integrated.title: Fully integrated
fully-integrated.description: JSX Mail is a complete email workflow tool that lets you do everything in one place without needing other tools.

simple-usage.title: Simple usage
simple-usage.description: With full integration, JSX Mail is easy to use; for example: with images, just add images to your project, and it optimizes, hosts, and inserts them automatically into the final email.

compatibility.title: Compatibility
compatibility.description: JSX Mail is compatible with all email clients, converting JSX code into HTML and adapting tags for universal support.

developer-friendly.title: Developer friendly
developer-friendly.description: Designed with developers in mind, JSX Mail enhances the coding experience, focusing on efficient email development.

features.jsx-syntax: Create email templates with JSX syntax
features.preview: Preview your email templates in real time
features.compatibility: Get compatibility with all email clients
features.images: Optimize and host the images of your email templates

features.free-emails: The first {count, number} of each month are free
features.insights: Stay on top of your email sending insights

pricing-subscription.question: Is the pricing a subscription?
pricing-subscription.answer: No, the JSX Mail Cloud is a pay-as-you-go service. You only pay for what you use, and there are no subscription fees.

use-with-other-frameworks.question: Can I use JSX Mail Cloud with other frameworks?
use-with-other-frameworks.answer: Yes, you can see into the <apiReference>API Reference</apiReference> the JSX Mail Cloud if just a API that you call by giving a HTML body, and we will send it for you. So you can use any framework to build your email, and then just send it to JSX Mail Cloud.

use-framework-with-other-providers.question: Can I use JSX Mail framework with other sending providers?
use-framework-with-other-providers.answer: Yes, as you can see into the <renderingDocs>rendering documentation</renderingDocs>, you can use the JSX Mail framework just for generating the HTML body, and then you can use any sending provider to send your email. You can also <zipDocs>get the files as images</zipDocs> and then add it to any email platform that need a zip file.

use-with-other-languages.question: Can I use the JSX Mail Cloud with other languages?
use-with-other-languages.answer: Yes, you can use the JSX Mail Cloud with any language that can send a HTTP request, like: JavaScript/Node.js, Python, PHP, Ruby, Go, Rust, Java, C#, etc.

large-scale-campaigns.question: Is JSX Mail Cloud suitable for large-scale email campaigns?
large-scale-campaigns.answer: Yes, JSX Mail is designed to handle large-scale email campaigns efficiently. You can leverage the Cloud features to manage and send bulk emails seamlessly.

support.question: What kind of support is available for JSX Mail?
support.answer: We offer community support through our <githubDiscussions>github discussions</githubDiscussions> and you can also contact our <supportTeam>support team</supportTeam> for more personalized assistance.

email-limits.question: Is there a limit to the number of emails I can send?
email-limits.answer: There are no hard limits on the number of emails you can send, but we recommend checking our pricing page for any applicable usage policies.

compliance.question: Does JSX Mail comply with email marketing regulations?
compliance.answer: Yes, JSX Mail is designed to comply with major email marketing regulations, including the CAN-SPAM Act and GDPR. We provide features that help you manage consent and ensure that your email campaigns adhere to legal requirements.

Footer.license: JSX Mail is licensed under MIT

hero.title: JSX Mail Cloud
hero.subtitle: The most efficient and cost-effective cloud for email delivery, image hosting, and campaign analytics.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: JSX Mail Cloud provides everything you need for your email workflow, from sending emails to hosting images and tracking analytics.

emailDelivery.title: Email Delivery
emailDelivery.description: Send emails reliably with high deliverability rates and real-time tracking.

imageHosting.title: Image Hosting
imageHosting.description: Automatically optimize and host images for your email campaigns with global CDN delivery.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: Track opens, clicks, and other engagement metrics to optimize your email campaigns.

bulkSending.title: Bulk Sending Made Simple
bulkSending.subtitle: Reach thousands of recipients with just a few clicks

importCsv.title: Import CSV
importCsv.description: Upload thousands of contacts at once with a simple CSV import

groupManagement.title: Group Management
groupManagement.description: Organize contacts into targeted groups for precise segmentation

automaticDeduplication.title: Automatic Deduplication
automaticDeduplication.description: Smart system removes duplicates to maintain clean contact lists

advancedFiltering.title: Advanced Filtering
advancedFiltering.description: Target specific segments based on behavior or demographics

process.title: From Hundreds to Thousands in Minutes
process.description: Our bulk email system is designed for scale, letting you reach your entire audience without the complexity. Perfect for newsletters, announcements, or marketing campaigns.

createGroup.title: Create Your Contact Group
createGroup.description: Start by creating a new contact group in your dashboard. Give it a meaningful name that reflects your audience segment.

importContacts.title: Import Your Contacts
importContacts.description: Upload your contact list via CSV file or use our API to programmatically add subscribers. Our system automatically handles duplicates and validates email formats.

designCampaign.title: Design Your Campaign
designCampaign.description: Use our intuitive editor, JSX Mail Framework or HTML to craft beautiful, responsive emails that look great on any device.

sendAndTrack.title: Send and Track
sendAndTrack.description: Send your campaign and watch real-time analytics as your audience engages with your content.

optimization.title: Automatic Delivery Optimization
optimization.description: Our system intelligently manages sending rates to maximize deliverability, automatically throttling when needed to ensure your emails reach the inbox, not the spam folder.

payAsYouGo.title: Only true pay-as-you-go service
payAsYouGo.description: Unlike competitors who require subscriptions, we offer genuine pay-as-you-go pricing. Pay only for what you use with no monthly commitments.

highDeliverability.title: High deliverability
highDeliverability.description: Our infrastructure ensures your emails reach the inbox, not the spam folder.

easyIntegration.title: Easy integration
easyIntegration.description: Simple API that works with any framework, not just JSX Mail. Send HTML emails from any source.

comprehensiveSolution.title: Comprehensive solution
comprehensiveSolution.description: Email delivery, image hosting, and analytics all in one platform for a seamless workflow.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
